price: ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߝߏ߬ߟߌ ߊߟߊ߫ ߓߍ߲߬ߢߐ߲߰ߦߊ߬ ߟߏ߲ ߘߐ߫ ߖߐ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߘߏ߲߬ ߓߘߊ߫ ߛߊ߬ߙߊ߫ ߞߊ߬ߡߙߊ߬ߒߞߋ߫ ߘߐߓߍ߲߬ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫
arabic: تَحِيَّتُهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَلۡقَوۡنَهُۥ سَلَٰمٞۚ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا كَرِيمٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: taḥiyyatuhum yawma yalqawnahu salāmun wa-aʿadda lahum ajran karīman
